name: String
description: An inbuilt data-type that describes a string.

name: Character
description: An inbuilt datatype that describes a character.

name: Integer
description: An inbuilt datatype that specifies an integer.

name: Float
description: An inbuilt datatype that specifies a float.

name: Double
description: An inbuilt datatype that specifies a double.

name: Byte
description: An inbuilt datatype that specifies a byte.

name: Boolean
description: An inbuilt datatype that specifies a boolean.
